title: Set Up a Recurring Transfer
description: A customer wants to set up a recurring monthly transfer of $500 from their checking to their savings account.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the source and destination accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's checking and savings accounts.

tasks.description: Collect the details for the recurring transfer: amount, frequency, and start date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the transfer details ($500, monthly, starting next month).

tasks.description: Create the recurring transfer in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets up the automated transfer and provides a confirmation.
